    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    App
     
    BuildProcessor
    Handles the CI build pipeline: clones a repository, compiles it, and returns a CIResultObject containing the results.
    CIResultObject
    This class is a data object that contains the results of a CI run.
    GitHubStatusNotifier
    Sends commit status notifications to the GitHub Status API.
    Server
    HTTP server that listens for GitHub webhook push events and triggers CI builds.
    WebhookPayload
    Parses a GitHub push event webhook payload, extracting the repository URL, branch name, and commit SHA which we need for triggering CI builds.
